attributes.action: Make it an offense to unnessaseraliy use snail poison,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of snail poison means a build up of toxins in birds and hadgehogs, until then sicken and die. Also it is an inhumane way to kill them, it can take days to die and they suffer a lot. I personally take in many poisoned snails, many who are incurable, and one took two weeks to die, two weeks of suffering. I petition the prime minister to make in against the law to kill snails so inhumanely, and unessesarly use snail poison ( in gardens for instance ).
